sentences.en: A new arc welder realizes multi - function and anti - elector shock through single chip and fuzzy control.
sentences.cn: 新焊机采用单片机及模糊控制实现弧焊机的多外特性及 防 触电功能,使焊机既一机多用,又安全可靠.

sentences.en: A polling station is where I vote and is listed on my Elector Information Card.
sentences.cn: 投票站是我前去投票的地方.选平易近登记证上面开列的有投票地点.

sentences.en: A registered elector is entitled to subscribe only ONE nomination form in this by - election.
sentences.cn: 每一位登记选民只可就今次 补选 签署一份提名表格.

sentences.en: A registered elector is entitled to subscribe only ONE nomination form.
sentences.cn: 每一位登记选民只可签署一份提名表格.

sentences.en: Good - day to you, Monsieur the Elector!
I am a registered elector for a the geographical constituency.
sentences.cn: 本人已登记为地方选区的选民.

sentences.en: It tells you who is Emperor, who is Elector Count and who has been banned.
sentences.cn: 它会告诉你谁是皇帝, 谁是选举议会成员,谁被帝国驱逐了.

sentences.en: Over 36% of electors did not vote at all.
sentences.cn: 超过36%的选民放弃了投票。

sentences.en: The list of elector is put up on the noticeboard in the local office.
sentences.cn: 选举人的名单贴在地方办公室的布告栏上.
